Subject: Payment Declined
TextBody: Hey, I am having an issue processing my payment, can you please help ASAP?

Subject: Trouble Logging In
TextBody: Hi, I forgot my password and the reset link isn’t working. What can I do?

Subject: Dashboard keeps crashing
TextBody: Every time I open the analytics dashboard, the page freezes. This is urgent.

Subject: Can I get a copy of my last invoice?
TextBody: Hi, I just need a copy of the invoice from March if possible. Thanks!

Subject: Just wanted to say thank you!
TextBody: Hey team — not an issue here, just wanted to say I love your product!

Subject: Change email address
TextBody: Hi, I’d like to update my account email to new.email@example.com when you get a chance.
